wordpressPost.title: Samurai
wordpressPost.content: On a certain forum I sometimes visit somebody posted an animation they did, a cartoon to be more precise. It seems to be made using odd shamanistic techniques of professional artists with a tinge of pepper and a dash of magic to create this beautiful short cartoon that will blow you away.
